cards.name: Axis Bank Atlas Credit Card
cards.summary: Premium EDGE Miles card with tiered rewards, lounge visits, and milestone bonuses tailored for frequent travellers.
cards.seoDescription: Explore the Axis Bank Atlas Credit Card welcome benefits, EDGE Miles earning structure, lounge access, and tier upgrades to plan your travel strategy.
cards.conversion: 1 EDGE Mile = 2 partner miles (2:1 for Marriott Bonvoy)
keyHighlights: 4% valueback on everyday spends (≈8% via Accor)
10% valueback when booking direct with hotels & airlines or Axis Travel EDGE (≈20% via Accor)
Strong milestone perks for high spenders

bullets: Welcome benefit of 2500 Edge Miles when you pay annual fee and make 1st transaction
There is no renewal fee wavier but you get renewal benefits on reaching certain spend threshold

paragraphs: 2500 Edge Miles are valued at a minimum INR 5000. If Trasnfered to accor value jumps to INR 1000. This compensates more than enough for joining fee
EDGE Miles stack quickest when travel bookings flow through Axis Travel EDGE or direct airline and hotel channels.

rows: Bonus applies up to ₹2,00,000 spend per month; thereafter 2 Miles / ₹100

bullets: Exclusions: gold & jewellery, rent, wallet loads, government payments, insurance, fuel, utilities, telecom.

paragraphs: Redeem EDGE Miles for flights, hotels or experiences, or move them to airline and hotel partners when a sweet spot appears.

bullets: Redeem on Travel Edge portal: 1 Edge Mile = ₹1
Trasnfer to Airlines miles at 1 Edge Mile = 2 Airline Miles
Trasnfer to Hotel points at 1 Edge Mile = 2 Hotel points(except marriot which is 2:1)

paragraphs: Hit these spends inside your card anniversary year to unlock extra EDGE Miles.

bullets: Tier qualification and milestone tracking follow the card anniversary year.

paragraphs: Atlas tiers unlock higher lounge quotas and milestone earning.

bullets: If you miss the spend target in the next cycle the tier downgrades.
Accor is the sweet spot for redemption with 8% base redmption value.
Exceptional returns when swiping directly on Hotel and Airline, both online and offline.
Travel aggregators like MakeMyTrip and Goibibo do not earn accelerated Edge Miles
EDGE Miles are not encashable.
Tier spend exclusions mirror the earning exclusions.
Track spends on a card-anniversary basis for milestone evaluation.

applyNow.label: Apply Now
applyNow.disclaimer: You will leave Travel with Points and continue on Axis Bank's secure site.

cards.name: HDFC Bank Regalia Gold Credit Card
cards.summary: Premium lifestyle card bundling Swiggy One, MMT Black Gold, quarterly vouchers, and lounge visits for frequent travellers.
cards.seoDescription: Review the HDFC Bank Regalia Gold Credit Card welcome memberships, 5X partner rewards, milestone flight vouchers, and lounge access before you apply.
cards.conversion: 1 RP = up to 0.5 air mile via airline partners
keyHighlights: Unlock Swiggy One and MMT Black Gold after ₹1 lakh spend in 90 days.
Earn 5X rewards on Myntra, Fligh Bookings and Gift Vouchers through Smartbuy.
Earn 10X rewards on Pharmeasy, Hotel Bookings and IGP through Smartbuy.

cardImage.alt: HDFC Bank Regalia Gold Credit Card

paragraphs: Regalia Gold unlocks lifestyle memberships and a joining voucher when you meet the initial spend requirement.

rows: Swiggy One and MMT Black Gold after ₹1,00,000 spend in 90 days
₹2,500 travel voucher issued after the joining fee posts

paragraphs: Build a healthy Reward Points balance on every purchase and supercharge partner merchant spends.

bullets: 5X points partner on smartbuy - Myntra, MakeMytrip Holiday, Redbus and others
10X points partner on smartbuy - Pharmeasy, Jockey and Jockey
Maximum 2000 Accelerated RPs can be earned in 1 day
Maximum 4000 Accelerated RPs can be earned in a calendar month
Exclusions - fuel, wallet, rent and tax payments.

paragraphs: Redeem via HDFC SmartBuy for maximum value or move points to airline partners when conversions align with your itinerary.

bullets: Airline partners convert at up to 1 RP : 0.5 air mile.
You can cover up to 70% of a booking's value with Reward Points.
Accor is the sweet spot as it gives 1 RP = ₹1 value.

paragraphs: Stay on track each quarter and anniversary year to scoop extra travel value.

rows: ₹1,500 voucher from brands like Marriott, Myntra, MMT, Marks & Spencer, Reliance Digital

bullets: Priority Pass visits beyond the quota bill at US$27.
Enjoy Good Food Trail dining offers with flat 10% off at thousands of restaurants via Dineout.

rows: Swipe the card at terminals across India
Usage within India is chargeable; add-on cards need their own Priority Pass

bullets: Base reward rate is not good enough so use it only through smartbuy.
Accor gives best value so you can use this as an accor co-branded card.
HDFC Salary Account customers can usually gets this card as LTF.
Regalia Gold is a no brainer if you are not elegible for any other premium card
Regalia Gold acts as a stepping stone towards DCB and Infinia

applyNow.disclaimer: Application is handled directly by HDFC Bank.

cards.name: HSBC TravelOne Credit Card
cards.summary: Premium travel card with instant airline transfers, rich lounge access, and milestone bonuses for heavy travellers.
cards.seoDescription: Review the HSBC TravelOne Credit Card welcome bonuses, 1:1 airline and hotel transfers, lounge visits, and milestone rewards before you apply.
cards.conversion: 1 RP = 1 airline mile or hotel point with select partners
keyHighlights: ₹1,000 cashback, ₹3,000 postcard hotel voucher and EazyDiner Prime after ₹10K spend in 30 days.
Earn up to 4 Reward Points per ₹100 on travel and overseas purchases with a 1:1 partner transfer ratio.
Access 6 domestic and 4 international lounges plus golf and lifestyle privileges.

bullets: Welcome bonus of 3,000 Reward Points also triggers on the first ₹1,00,000 spent within 90 days.

rows: ₹1,000 cashback + ₹3,000 Postcard Hotel voucher + 3-month EazyDiner Prime
Accelerated earn up to ₹50,000 equivalent each month
Reward Points accrue at 1 RP per ₹50

bullets: HSBC Market Place has price garuntee upto ₹1500 per booking.
15% off upto ₹5000 on flight bookigs via Paytm Flights and ClearTrip
20% off on select duty free stores
Prices on HSBC Marketplace tend to be higher than other OTA's which dampen the reward rate'

paragraphs: Transfer points instantly to airline and hotel partners through the HSBC mobile app for 1:1 conversions on most partners.

bullets: Air India, Air France-KLM Flying Blue, British Airways, Etihad Guest, Singapore Airlines KrisFlyer
Qatar Airways Privilege Club, Qantas, United MileagePlus, Turkish Airlines Miles&Smiles, Japan Airlines, Vietnam Airlines
AirAsia (1:3 conversion ratio)
Marriott Bonvoy, Accor Live Limitless, IHG One Rewards
Wyndham Rewards, Shangri-La Circle (5:1 conversion ratio)
Six domestic and four international lounge visits per year included in the base fee.
Four complimentary golf rounds and twelve lessons annually (one free benefit per month).
Holiday partner offers: 15% off with Yatra, EaseMyTrip, Paytm Travel, Cleartrip, plus 11% off StayVista (max ₹3,000).
Duty-free savings up to 20% at select outlets.
We feel this is one of the best travel cards considering a low entry barrier of 4 Lac salary requirement.
This card might not suit you ff you already hold a super premium card or an Axis Atlas.
High Prices on HSBC Marketplace is a bummer.
HSBC has Accor as transfer partner so it enhances reward value

applyNow.label: Apply via HSBC India
applyNow.disclaimer: Check the HSBC website for the latest eligibility and terms.

cards.name: American Express® Platinum Travel Credit Card
cards.summary: Milestone-driven Membership Rewards card that unlocks Taj travel vouchers, domestic lounge visits, and concierge-backed support for frequent flyers.
cards.seoDescription: Maximize Membership Rewards with the American Express Platinum Travel Credit Card. Learn how milestone bonuses, Taj vouchers, and lounge access combine to elevate your travel strategy.
cards.conversion: 1 MR = ₹0.25 or more when redeemed via the Platinum Travel Collection
keyHighlights: ₹10,000 Taj Experiences e-gift card plus 25K MR after ₹4 lakh annual milestone
Membership Rewards never expire while the account remains in good standing

cardImage.alt: American Express Platinum Travel Credit Card

paragraphs: Start your Membership Rewards journey with a sizeable welcome bonus and milestone-driven Taj vouchers each membership year.

bullets: Bonus MR split between automatic posting and a quick call or chat with Amex support.

rows: 25,000 Membership Rewards points + ₹10,000 Taj Experiences e-gift card

paragraphs: Membership Rewards accrue at a steady pace across everyday spends, ready for travel conversions.

bullets: No accelerated earn categories keep tracking simple.
Exclusions: fuel, insurance, utilities, cash transactions, and in-store EMI conversions.

paragraphs: Redeem through the Platinum Travel Collection or Pay with Points on Amex Travel Online for consistent ₹0.25+ value per MR.

bullets: Use points for domestic or international flights and hotels via Amex Travel Online.
Convert milestone bonuses into Taj stays, dining, or spa experiences.
Points never expire while the account stays active and in good standing.
Expect a ₹2 authorization swipe at participating lounges for entry.
Priority Pass benefits follow program terms; guest visits are chargeable.

rows: Capped at 2 visits per quarter for the primary cardmember
Visits for primary cardmember and guests billed at prevailing US$35 rate

bullets: Dedicated Platinum Travel assistance with zero lost card liability once reported.
Fuel convenience fee waivers at HPCL locations, plus EMI options on eligible purchases.
Up to 20% dining savings at partner restaurants with American Express offers.

applyNow.label: Apply with American Express
applyNow.disclaimer: American Express India will provide the full application details.

cardStrategies.title: Lead with transferable currencies
cardStrategies.description: Choose cards whose rewards move into multiple airline and hotel partners so you can chase the best sweet spots without being locked in.

cardStrategies.title: Layer milestone timelines
cardStrategies.description: Stack welcome, quarterly, and annual milestones from different cards so a single purchase can unlock multiple bonuses.

cardStrategies.title: Balance lounge coverage
cardStrategies.description: Mix domestic and international lounge entitlements across cards to cover the whole family on busy travel days.

favoriteCombos.name: Weekend getaway duo
cards: HDFC Bank Regalia Gold Credit Card
favoriteCombos.note: Atlas handles EDGE Miles transfers while Regalia Gold layers on quarterly stay vouchers and extra lounge visits.

favoriteCombos.name: Global explorer stack
favoriteCombos.note: Pair instant airline transfers from TravelOne with Atlas tier perks to cover both domestic and overseas trips.

favoriteCombos.name: Voucher maximiser
cards: American Express® Platinum Travel Credit Card
HDFC Bank Regalia Gold Credit Card
favoriteCombos.note: Use Amex for high-value Taj vouchers and MR points while Regalia Gold fills gaps with SmartBuy redemptions.
